title: A new attack on the Al-Shifa hospital in Gaza! - New era
description: At the dawn of March 18, the genocidal army of Israel again attacked the Al-Shifa hospital, the largest hospital complex in the Gaza Strip. The Ministry of Health speaks of "tens of thousands" of people in the hospital in a humanitarian situation beyond the catastrophic. More than 30,000 dead have been identified, and […]
author: Missak Manouchian
